text: Mildred Kornman (July 10, 1925 - August 19, 2022), also known as Ricki VanDusen, was an American child actress. Mildred was the leading lady of the silent movie Our Gang series. She was featured as a regular in the series from 1926â€“1928 and made more appearances from 1929 until 1935. She had no speaking roles and appeared when many children. Kornman died on August 19, 2022 at the age of 97.Mildred Kornman ==References== ==Other websites== * Mildred Kornman aka Ricki VanDusen home page * * Category:1925 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American child actors Category:American silent movie actors Category:Actors from Beverly Hills, California
title: Mildred Kornman
